attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Living in North Wales, we see the heavy goods going to and from Ireland. Fifty to eighty trucks per ferry in/out Hollyhead docks. Many of these vehicles transit to the continent damaging our motorways. I should imagine few if any purchase fuel in the UK. Make them pay a toll instead of pricing us off of the roads.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
